item.description:
Ah, the holiday season...A magical time of heartwarming stories, lovingly selected gifts, gaily colored lights, and applewood-smoked bacon (You were waiting for it, weren't you?)

Yes, the hardworking elves of the Org Team are pleased to announce an event that we feel will fit just right into the weekend between Christmas and New Year's Day - We are going to brunch at The Sun Tavern in Duxbury on Sunday, December 28th.

Run as a restaurant since the 1930's!, the Sun Tavern is known for its atmosphere, its history (it's even supposed to be haunted) and, of course, its food.

Sunday Brunch is only served here from October through April and, unlike many local restaurants, the Tavern offers a brunch menu rather than a buffet. The menu is unfortunately not online, but the main brunch selections range in price from $9.00 - $15.00, with a selection of lower-priced "starter" items also available.

Brunch seems to always be a popular event with SSDOMG, and Angela and Mike are guessing that the trend will continue as we head to Duxbury to share some holiday cheer with old friends and new.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The Sun Tavern
500 Congress St., Duxbury
781-837-4100
http://www.thesuntave...
Sunday, December 28 @ 11:30 AM

Organizers: Mike & Angela

Min/Max: None at this time

Guests: Up to two per member.

Event Fee: None! As a holiday gift to our members, we are not charging our normal $2.00 event fee! Members and their Guests will only pay for what they order.

Price Range: Main Brunch items range from $9.00 - $15.00. "Starter" items which cost less are also available.

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over two years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps us to keep things simple for everyone.

RSVP Deadline: Saturday, December 27 @ 5:00 PM

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions (Credit to Sun Tavern website): The Sun Tavern is located on Route 14 (Congress Street) in Duxbury. From Route 3, their website gives directions as follows: "Take Route 3...to Exit 11 in Duxbury. Take a left at the top of the ramp onto Route 14 (Congress St) and follow Â¾ mile. The Sun Tavern is located on your right."
item.how_to_find_us: Our reservation is under both 'Mike' and 'South Shore Meetup Group'.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Brunch Between the Holidays!
